Reviews.Title: Amazing camera :)
Reviews.Author: Randa
Reviews.Content: I really cannot say enough about this canon camera. It has a lot of amazing features, you can customize how you want to take your photos, and it is not very complicated. This Kit includes 17 items which means you do not have to buy any additional accessories. The price of Canon Rebel T5i is $849 with one lens only, Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens worth around $180 if you buy it separately, but with this set you only pay for the camera and the 75-300mm Telephoto Zoom lens, and you get everything else for FREE. I am very happy with the quality of all the accessories. It is a very good deal :)

Reviews.Title: What I was expecting and then some...
Reviews.Author: Teri S.
Reviews.Content: This is my first foray into the DSLR realm and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. This camera came highly recommended from several of my friends who have the T3i and they were all amazed at the deal that this package has. This comes with everything that a beginner could need to get started and all for the cost of just the EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens and camera.Everything came securely packaged from the seller Focus Camera. My only complaint so far is that the tripod is slightly wobbly when fully extended, but that was mentioned in another post and so I was expecting that and purchased another tripod set, which I was going to do anyways for the remote control, monopod, and flexible tripods.This camera is fantastic. I previously had a Canon Powershot and loved it, but I had finally reached the maximum capabilities of that camera and was looking for something more to get night-time shots and better macros. Just setting this T5i to Auto settings already blows my Powershot out of the water and I can't wait to get into the manual features. I'll add more as I explore my wonderful new camera!Update Feb 2014: I love this thing and can't put it down. I watched the DVD that came with the camera and started shooting and am so happy with the results! I haven't had any issues at all with the camera function, lenses, etc. yet.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Di
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera and buying the bundle was such a great deal!!  I have used almost everything in it so far.  I took a refresher course on photography and even the instructor was amazed at everything that came with it and what the camera had to offer.

Reviews.Title: Bad tripod
Reviews.Author: Leroy Scott
Reviews.Content: Would of given 5 stars but the tripod was not very good, cheeply made, wiggles when set up, could have dropped the price a little and left out the tripod.

Reviews.Title: A great DSLR camera and a pretty decent bundle.
Reviews.Author: Chuck Bittner "Disabled comedian & gamer!"
Reviews.Content: If you're somebody that wants to get into shooting more advanced photography then just point and shoot or cell phone photography then this is a good place to start.  The main reasons are they allow you full manual controls and the interchangeable lenses.  These allow you to change so much of how the cameras functions in different lighting situations. And over the last five years Canon digital SLR cameras have become very capable of 1080p high definition video cameras also. Over the course of this review I get a mention some basics about digital photography that can help you if you're a first-time camera buyer. Below I will give you a few tips that I've learned is I become a more dance photographer just in case you're new to using DSLR (digital single lens reflex) cameras.This bundle is a good price and has some decent gear.  The zoom lens retails for about $130 on Amazon.I do want to point out that you can save a few dollars by getting the older models like the T3i but still get the full manual controls like this camera. Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera and DIGIC 4 Imaging with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens  at the time of writing this it was about $260 cheaper( If you search around you can probably get it for half the price). In my opinion it's still a very capable camera when compared the T5i. And if you're on a budget is definitely a good alternative. And that way you can get an additional lens or two. And that's the thing you want to do with a camera like this is get a few different lenses.1. The number one reason to get a camera like this is the full manual controls over such things as shutter speed and aperture. Most point-and-shoot digital cameras that you can buy today for under $200 don't allow you to adjust these things but really if you're serious about photography learning how shutter speed and aperture work together to create photographs is very important. And the fact that this camera allows you to control these features and so many more manually means you can make great photographs. In point number two I will explain how shutter speed and aperture work together but just know that they are very important and having control of them means you're in a make better photos. Notice I said make better photos instead of take better photos that is because by learning how shutter speed and aperture work together you will be able to create photos where regular point-and-shoot cameras would fail.2. Interchangeable lenses are a MAJOR reason you will want this camera. If you search Canon lenses on Amazon you will see that they offer a wide variety of lenses for this camera. Take for example this 50mm lens that everybody calls the nifty 50: Canon EF 50mm f/1.8 II Camera Lens The best part about this amazing lens is that it's less than $100. And the cool thing is you can get a lot of different lenses relatively cheap for these Canon cameras.The lens that comes with this camera is ok but it's lowest f-stop is 5 and that is bad in low light situations.  I definitely recommend the 50mm linked above as it helps learning the manual controls of this camera.HOW APERTURE AND SHUTTER SPEED WORK: (The following was taken from my 50mm lens review but it walks you through understanding shutter speed and aperture)Here I'll explain how the f-stop or aperture priority works on digital SLR cameras. Basically the aperture is a circle inside the lens that as you go up in your f-stop from 1.8 to 2.2 to 3.0 and beyond it shrinks the size of this circle in the lens. The shrinking of the circle from a higher f-stop allows less light to pass through to the sensor. The lower the f-stop i.e. 1.8 allows you to shoot at faster shutter speeds in low light situations because the circle in the lens allows more light to pass through because of the lower aperture. Here's an example say are in a well lit room and you're shooting your child (yes that sounds very weird but it's a funny joke anyway). Generally indoors you need to shoot at 1/60 of a second with most lenses they'll instantly autofocus at their lowest f-stop which would be about 4.0. But with this lens since it can go down to 1.8 on the f-stop you could shoot the same picture at 1/125 shutter speed. Resulting in about the same light but avoiding any motion blur that plagues low light photography. Now needs to be noted that as you drop your f-stop you lose depth of field. I.e. how much of your photo will be in focus and how much will be blurred. It's the effect you see on portraits where the person is in focus but the background is blurry.Now I know many people will probably shoot holes in the foregoing explanation of f-stop but I'm not a really advanced photographer but I get how shutter speed and aperture priority work with each other. Buying a lens like this can only help somebody understand how both are related and work together.Here's what I recommend that you do:1. Enable manual mode on your camera this mode allows you to set both the aperture for the lens a.k.a. the f-stop and the shutter speed a.k.a. how long the shutter is opened while taking a photograph.2. Drop the aperture or f-stop to 1.8 on this lens3. Set your shutter speed to 1/60 of a second4. take a picture5. Look at your photograph notice how much is dark and light about it how sharp it is etc.6. Go up to the next shutter speed 1/90th of the second or 1/125 and take another photograph.7. now compare both of the photographs you took8. to change the shutter speed again going up another step taken other photograph now compare all three photographsIf you continue to do this adjust shutter speed while knowing what your aperture is you're going to notice how shutter speed affects the lighting of your photographs all you need to do then is start changing your aperture and repeat the process of stepping through your shutter speeds eventually you'll understand how the aperture works in correlation with shutter speed. I became a proficient photographer using manual controls in less than a month just by doing this simple practice. I would recommend starting outdoors on a well lit day because then you will see how you can adjust your aperture and your shutter speeds to really make good photographs.***END***On the top of this camera there's a dial on the dial there is the Tv mode for shutter priority aka you can adjust the shutter speed up and down while the camera adjusts the aperture. There is also Av mode where the camera allows you to adjust the aperture of the lens while it handles the shutter speed. And then finally on that dial there is the magic M and that is manual mode and that's where you get to set the shutter speed and aperture for yourself. If you follow the tips and step-by-step above even if you just use the lens included you will get better at photography.3. HD video: One of my favorite things about this line of cameras is you can shoot video at 1080p which is very high-resolution and looks great on high definition televisions and even on YouTube. And with the fact you can use interchangeable lenses you can really start to do some amazing things with your video. Dropping your f-stop to 1.8 on the 50mm lens and being able to shoot 1080p video is really incredible.Those are my three main reasons why these canon cameras are the BEST for new photographers and even videographers nowadays.I also TOTALLY RECOMMEND getting the battery grip: Opteka Battery Pack Grip / Vertical Shutter Release for Canon Rebel T2i, T3i, T4I, T5i,Digital SLR Cameras with 2 Extra LP-E8 Extended Life High Capacity Batteries, Wireless Infrared Remote and Lens Cleaning Kit They add so much to this camera as far as feel.  Plus the extra battery life is so useful. And it's less than $60 with two extra batteries.Hope this helps thanks for reading this wall of text. If you have any questions feel free to post them here and I'll try to get back to you.

Reviews.Title: Great KIT!
Reviews.Author: Art K. "Art K."
Reviews.Content: Lowest price anywhere, for this camera, and these lenses. Gift for my daughter, she loves it, and is thrilled with it. Can't really compare with other cameras, but look around the web for reviews.

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase!
Reviews.Author: Marcos Antonio Cardoso dos Santos
Reviews.Content: I'm very satisfied with my recent purchase: the price,the delivery and the camera are excellent. There is only one thing that must be improved: The package included two batteries: One original canon and the other "for canon", this is similar to canon. This similar one doesn't work at all. I had to buy another one elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Fulrath Mill Cavaliers gives top rating for quick action shots!
Reviews.Author: J. smith
Reviews.Content: This camera was a big step up for me and a HUGE help in my business (breeding and raising Cavalier King Charles Spaniels).  Almost all of my customers find me though my website and through a couple of breeder websites, and if I could say in just one word what sells puppies, it would be PICTURES!  The thing that initially attracts people to my website and to the breeder websites is pictures of these darling little puppies.  The problem I had in the past was getting good quality photos of these little moving targets!  Puppy photography is, by nature, very challenging when your subject has the attention span of a gnat and the energy of rocket fuel!  I needed a camera that takes good high speed pics.That is a tall order for most cameras.  I am in no way, shape or form a professional photographer, but I was able to begin taking some really great shots right out of the box using the sports setting and just making sure I had ample lighting in the room.  I no longer have blurry shots or pictures of nothing but tails as I did with my old camera.  I no longer have to depress the shutter part way, wait a second and a half and then click.  Now I'm clicking off shots in rapid fire and actually get the whole puppy in the photos rather than just the tails as they exit the photo area!  It's great!  I honestly haven't had time (with 9 puppies in house) to investigate all the features and try out different attachments, but I hope to be able to sit down with it soon and do the tutorial and learn more about it, but so far, I absolutely love it. I've had lots of compliments from my puppy families about the great photos I've been sending them lately.  It was a big investment, but one I'd repeat in a heart beat!  Great product.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for DSLR lovers
Reviews.Author: S. B. Bairavi "Su Ba"
Reviews.Content: Just an awesome camera. This is my first DSLR and I loved it. Its been a 10 years wait for me to grab an affordable one which lasts longer. Looking forward for great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Joel Brit Johnston
Reviews.Content: Camera is amazing. Love all the lenses and extras. Only complaint is the camera bag barely holds camera body much less any other attachments or lenses

Reviews.Title: I bought this for my girlfriend.
Reviews.Author: Levi Cannon
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend is a photographer.She broke her silly Nikon,I bought her this amazing monstrosity.SHE DOESNT BOTHER ME TO DO THINGS ANYMORESHE DOESNT BOTHER ME WHILE IM TRYING TO DO THINGS ANYMORESHE GOES OFF AND SHE TAKES AMAZING PICTURESbuy this for your girlfriend so you can go back to doing man stuff.

Reviews.Title: Some magical photos taken
Reviews.Author: Kiran Shastri
Reviews.Content: This is coming from a point and shoot camera user. Compared to what I have heard about how hard it can be to take out your DSLR everytime you need to take a picture and setup a tripod if you want a stable  photo, it has been a snap literally. Most photos taken with out tripod and under varying light conditions with canon rebel t5i  have turned out very good. Im impressed

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the beginner!
Reviews.Author: Douglas Tuttle
Reviews.Content: Got this for the wife but whole family is using it and enjoying it.  Great pictures, easy to use.  Good value too!

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Tracey Sampson
Reviews.Content: It was what I have been looking fir. Plus it had everything wuth it that I didn't have to buy and spend more money.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Camera, accessories not so much
Reviews.Author: Chris Loveless
Reviews.Content: I did quite a bit of research before deciding on this camera, i must say i am very pleased with the decision.The extras that come with it are disposableThe Tripod i wouldn't even trust with my point and shootThe solution that came with the cleaning kit leaked and ruined the kit, i suggest buying a nice kit anywayThe extra battery works great even tho its not OEMThe macro and telephoto lens are cheap but work as they shouldThe bag is a bit small but am able to fit all the lenses, charger, etc in it (it may take a few tries to adjust the dividers)I wish the 55-300 lens was IS but i use that with a tripod so it does the jobThe SD card is generic but a Class 10 and writes fastThe filters are clear and function as good as some of the more expensive onesThe camera is an amazing entry level hobbyist DSLR it has most of the features you will find on higher end models. I would have give given it 5 stars but the first camera that was shipped was defective and the flash did not work. I contacted Amazon and this was corrected immediately. This was the fist time having to call amazon customer support, and they were more than helpful.If you buy this camera with the expectation of not using most the the extras that come with it, you will be extremely happy :)

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Monroe
Reviews.Content: The camera and the accessories were great. The camera bag was moldy and had to be cleaned thoroughly before I could use it. It smelled musty and actually had mold all over the outside. I expected pristine condition for the amount I paid for the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Mostly good
Reviews.Author: Jim Sherman
Reviews.Content: The camera and main lenses are good, but the tripod is fairly flimsy and short, and the wide angle and telephoto lenses don't attach to the camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome purchase
Reviews.Author: Ashley Lucke
Reviews.Content: This was an awesome purchase. This is a great deal for all the items that come in the package. The camera and the lenses are all authentic Canon products. The other accessories are other brands but all work well. The tripod is cheaply made, but for the price you are paying you are getting a ton of items that are normally priced way above what you will be paying. If you are considering buying this bundle I say go ahead and do it, you wont be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Vivitar X2.2 add-on is junk
Reviews.Author: robert vest
Reviews.Content: fantastic camera, seamless performance and exceptional quality.I would opt for a different kit though based on the troubles I've had with the telephoto lens add-on from vivitar,the add-on lens makes the image milky and blurred, unable to auto-focus and can't manually focus to satisfaction...

Reviews.Title: Great bundle
Reviews.Author: YESENIA RUIZ
Reviews.Content: Everything was good and worked well. The tripod is a little flimsy but the price for the bundle was so good that it is not a deal breaker for me. The camera take beautiful pictures.

Reviews.Title: I was leery of the this deal - Turned out It's great!
Reviews.Author: BobC.
Reviews.Content: I've always used "if it's too good to be true then it usually is" as a buyers model.This deal; however, is truly a good deal. Everything was brand new in it's own boxes shipped in one big amazon box. Both lenses are official Cannon lenses. The tri pod is a great travel tri pod. All the extra goodies are off brand stuff but compatible with the camera. It was almost overwhelming all the things that come in the package for the price. I could hardly find the camera sold by itself for this price. People have been asking Does it come with a second battery - the answer is yes it's an off brand, but again it's compatible and works fine.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Shawn Lorg
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality.  Easy to use.  Lots of lens with package.  Quick delivery.  Video is good as long as the object you are video taping is not moving too fast for the focus to keep up

Reviews.Title: Nice but with concerns
Reviews.Author: Renato
Reviews.Content: I liked it so much, it is fast and powerfull. I'm having some difficulties about manual control that I think it is harder than Rebel T3.Even in manual mode I though some controls too automatic.All items on the kit is good, mainly a spare battery.

Reviews.Title: At present its I like it
Reviews.Author: Joyce Weaver "Chevymom53"
Reviews.Content: Had problems in the beginning, but still learning. I will update as I get use to it. You really need to look at the DVD that comes with it.

Reviews.Title: Professional Grade
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Garner
Reviews.Content: Had some professional pictures taken of the family. Same camera she used. It takes quite a bit a reading and playing with to get it perfect shots but once you do it's AWESOME!

Reviews.Title: Impressive!
Reviews.Author: P. H. Touranjoe
Reviews.Content: I've used a point & shoot for 20 years with good results. On a whim, I posted 4 of the pics on a photo site and 3 won the photo of the day, so I knew I had an eye for photography and it was time to take the plunge as my wife suggested, you guessed it - about 20 years ago.I put the kit on my wish list because I didn't want to pay 1300 beans for it. About 2 weeks later, the thing dropped to around 900 and since I got it I also purchased Dave Busch's book on specifically the T5i camera so I won't be wasting my time. This camera is amazing and I don't know how they can sell the kit for what they do. I saw an ad for the T5i in the paper the other day for 700 bucks. This camera is a computer with a lens and you can't take a bad picture with it. As soon as the temp gets back up to 0 around here, I plan on getting out and snapping a few shots.Bottom line, you can't go wrong getting this camera if you're serious about your photography. Have Fun!

Reviews.Title: I am lovin it
Reviews.Author: Babu Panthi
Reviews.Content: This is my first DSLR camera and it didn't disappoint me. It is perfect for everything you capture. All you need is some basic knowledge with photography. All the items in the bundle are very useful and this one is a great deal getting all these things in one bundle. Buying things in bundle will save your time and money. You don't have to look and buy for each individual things and compare prices. Perfect. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: This product is increible, it cames with all the things that you need for you camera. When i receive the box it was so exiting to open and open all the features that I want it. Totally recomended.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Deal!
Reviews.Author: Jerod
Reviews.Content: This bundle has everything you would ever want for a beginner or intermediate photographer! It comes with 2 great lenses, an extensive cleaning kit, & filters for those great pictures. If you're contemplating whether or not to buy this bundle over another I highly recommend this bundle over any comparison camera out right now for the average photographer or even professional. 5/5

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: Keith Kirssin
Reviews.Content: We are beginners in the SLR world.  Spoke to several friends that are serious photographers and they all recommended this camera as a great starting point for us.  We shopped around and found this to be a great deal with all the things we'd need to get started.  It arrived quickly, was packed well and in perfect condition.  Would recommend this package to anyone!

Reviews.Title: T5i
Reviews.Author: Genie Gnagi
Reviews.Content: Camera arrived on time with everything as described.  Can't wait to get the chance to use it traveling this summer.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: All what I need
Reviews.Author: Ute Foth
Reviews.Content: The I5S is a very nice camera. The package is complete. All what I need in one box. I am happy !

Reviews.Title: GREAT camera!
Reviews.Author: Brad Galles
Reviews.Content: My wife and I love the camera. I am not so happy with the rest of the bundle. I did read the text where it said that you would be receiving canon product or equivalent but I wasn't expecting the cheap chinese crap. The bag is useless in my opinion. Its poorly made. Very weak and poorly placed velcro inside the bag that provides the slots to keep gear. We will be purchasing a new bag soon to replace it. Most everything in the bag is MADE IN CHINA besides the CANON camera and lens. I wish now that I would have purchased just the camera and bought the rest separate. Again...The camera is fantastic but the cheap chinese crap is something I can do without.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Nicks
Reviews.Content: I stinking love this camera!!!! I see why people were complaing that it feels cheaply made but my pictures have been coming out beautiful like I always say the camera helps but the photographer makes the picture. Well worth the price I paid

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Deal!
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: Best value out there! Delivered on time with more accessories for the price than I expected. One of the most versatile user friendly cameras I have ever had.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Kevin D. Streeter
Reviews.Content: Everything was as depicted in the photo except the 32GB card for the camera.  It was an off brand which was defective.  Amazon made good by sending me,  at no charge, a replacement "SanDisk' memory card.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Dan B Villarreal
Reviews.Content: This is my third Rebel series camera and each generation has gotten better. The camera came packaged with some very useful items. I've only had the T5i a few days but it has passed all my tests so far.  The shutter release is more sensitive than I'm use to but that's minor and will resolve with use. Great product and really useful package.

Reviews.Title: First Time User
Reviews.Author: Taydan "Taydan"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera upon suggestion of someone who does photography on the side.  The only cameras I have ever owned were the simple point and shoot kind.  Upon receiving this I was excited and a little scared.  There was so much in the bundle to look at, use and understand.  I love this camera and use it all the time.  It is easy to use and the DVD included really helped to educate me on how to take quality pictures and understand the many features that come with this camera.  This was a investment that I am glad I made.

Reviews.Title: simply Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Karthik D V
Reviews.Content: Superb package ! Every thing delivered awesome.  But the sling of the bag was broken :( I don't want to return just for that. Amazing camera,  loving it!

Reviews.Title: Missing items
Reviews.Author: Reeynole B.
Reviews.Content: I did not receive all the items, the cleaning kits, and screen protectors all others I have receive were in good condition

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Kristen
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this camera as a soon to be mother and I'm so thrilled with this package. I think I've discovered a new hobby:)

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: AlexVasquez
Reviews.Content: I really love it, the delivery was right on time actually it arrived faster that what was expecting, the packaging was great to the firmly attached all components with a box, you can clearly see the good handle of everything. Concerning the package itself it had everything that you could possibly need for a beginner and at a great price value.

Reviews.Title: it is a great camera and the best bundle. worth to buy.wont regret.
Reviews.Author: jane8948
Reviews.Content: i love this camera, nice price. and the bundle provide everything you need. this camera is convenience to carry because it's not that heavy.

Reviews.Title: Missing SD card in order
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Everything thing was there that was supposed to be except the 32 gig SD card.  Other than that, it was fine.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: BECK
Reviews.Content: Everything was correct.  Has more stuff than we need, but for the price, can't be beat.  The DVD that came with it was also very good for getting you started on more advanced photography.

Reviews.Title: Amazing package deal
Reviews.Author: Vanessa Elizabeth Loften
Reviews.Content: This package deal came with everything I could possibly need to go with my camera. The price was unbeatable and everything works great.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Billy Nance
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. Has everything an intermediate needs.The lenses and camera are worth less alone. The rest is just icing on the cake.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Jairo Andres Novoa Mantilla
Reviews.Content: very satisfiedcompliance in each of the related item, very good quality so if you have the money to purchase this article not to miss the opportunity.

Reviews.Title: T5i camera
Reviews.Author: Tom Helvey
Reviews.Content: Good camera for a beginner like myself.  Having a blast learning how to use it.  Good bundle and a good value.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer!
Reviews.Author: Santae McWilliams
Reviews.Content: I was very satisfied with the products and the quality of products. Everything was as advertised. I highly recommend the t5i to others as well

Reviews.Title: Thanks !
Reviews.Author: Hovhannes Hovhannisyan
Reviews.Content: I love this product. I should still learn its features, but it seems very good for home use and even for professional use.

Reviews.Title: Rebel T5i
Reviews.Author: Leo Filippi
Reviews.Content: The camera and all the lenses are great. I've used most of them and can say that they work well.

Reviews.Title: My 1 MP DSLR Sony was good, but the T5i is in a different league!
Reviews.Author: Edward
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  Easy to use or highly complex - my choice!  The options allow single shots in fully automatic to total manual controlor full-length movies in HD.

Reviews.Title: Love these camera.
Reviews.Author: Kaitlyn
Reviews.Content: Everything came earlier than I expected.  Items are all very high quality.  Everything was packaged in the same box.  Picture quality is great.  Highly recommend this deal.  I researched for several days before purchasing from here.  I looked on nomorerack and several other websites and this was the best deal for the money.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable value
Reviews.Author: Easy
Reviews.Content: One of the best bargains I have ever received,  The camera the lenses, the DVD are all good value for what you're psying for.  Tri-pod is not he best but it works, still a great bargain!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera, excellent price!!
Reviews.Author: Pato Izquierdo
Reviews.Content: I have been in love of the EOS models of Canon and now the T5i, although not the top notch camera of the brand, is a very great and versatile model. All the other accesories are excellent and makes this pack be an awesome choice for a semi-professional photographer. It has everything you need for a starter semi-pro. I am very satisfied to have bought it!

Reviews.Title: Great for a person into photography!
Reviews.Author: Melody White
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my daughter for Christmas. She enjoyes photography and loved it. This was a great price and I would recommend Amazon for this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice package
Reviews.Author: Samantha Johnson
Reviews.Content: I was amazed with how many things were in that package - lots of good stuff. Camera is good. I really like the way pictures come up. Definitely a good-buy for me.

Reviews.Title: quick camera, easy to use
Reviews.Author: Abq-girl
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because I dropped my T1i Canon camera, it landed on the lens. The camera still works good but when I went to a local store to see if the lens was repairable or how much it would cost to replace the lens, I figured that the price of this new camera, which is better, and comes with so many other great items, was about a $500 difference. It just made more sense to upgrade and to get this bundle package than to replace just the lens. This camera is much quicker and does what I need it to, with much less effort. I also like that the smaller lens comes with image stability, which is a great feature, and something that my old lens did not. The only difference I see with the larger 300 lens is that it zooms in the other direction than my lens I dropped. It is a bit stiff when zooming in, but maybe that will change after more uses, still very new. Overall, I would recommend this package to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera!
Reviews.Author: HeatherS
Reviews.Content: Great camera! I've always loved Canon - so happy to make the switch to SLR.  This is a pretty good package deal, but will have to upgrade on tripod and other things.  Already ordered a bigger bag to hold gear, but this is a decent backup.  Great Camera!!!

Reviews.Title: T5I cannon Camera
Reviews.Author: kathleen haswell
Reviews.Content: Arrived as promised and everything was as promised. camera is lovely and light to handle and fits in most women's handbag.This is a nice feature when traveling. Very happy with the service and camera

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: mom review
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use.  The pictures are clear and easy to focus. Even the night pictures have come out clear.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and even a better deal!!!!
Reviews.Author: diego lopez
Reviews.Content: The package came complete and in perfect condition to Ecuador. Had to pay a little extra to bring in but other than that Im pretty pleased with everything

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Amazing
Reviews.Author: Andrew April
Reviews.Content: Could not be more pleased with everything. Canon products, and great Focus protective camera bag. Loved the tutorial as well.

Reviews.Title: Canon vs Nikon
Reviews.Author: Music
Reviews.Content: Looked at both Canon and the Nikon D5200. Both compared well. Priced the same in a bundle package. Canon had the touch screen. However Nikon had better resolution(MP). It was a personal choice, went with the Canon. Happy with the choice. Bothe were great values for the price at $899.00.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME DEAL!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Villanueva "sana-chan"
Reviews.Content: The package came safely packed with all items as listed. Everything was great to get started taking pictures right away. Truly a great offer for all the things you get.

Reviews.Title: Everything and more..
Reviews.Author: Andrew April
Reviews.Content: I liked everything about this bundle. Some bundles low ball you with cheap material like memory cards that are not fast enough to shoot video, and etc, however Focus was not like that.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Bundle!
Reviews.Author: Lenny P
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend just got this in the mail yesterday and it is great!  We've already shot a little review video on gaming stuff I do with it.  The quality of the camera is amazing.  All the stuff you get with it is insane, you're gonna spend way more buying all this stuff at Best Buy.  If you're looking for the Rebel t5i you won't get a cheaper deal than here.Here's a clip shot with the Rebel t5i and edited quickly in iMovie.[...]

Reviews.Title: Canon rebel t5i kit
Reviews.Author: jeremy alexander
Reviews.Content: Great camera and everything you need to get started taking photos. The camera is very user friendly and takes great action shots.

Reviews.Title: Nice Bundle
Reviews.Author: HayBail
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift fom my daughter and she loves it.  Arrived on time for Christmas, but the camera had a manufacturing defect and wouldn't work.  Received the replacement bundle as promised without any problems or difficulties.  Excellent customer service!

Reviews.Title: Recomend the vendor and product
Reviews.Author: Juliano Cappellete
Reviews.Content: Great product. New like the told by the vendor. It is not refurbished. The boxes came with a lot of protection. The T5i is the best camera I've ever seen.

Reviews.Title: Thank you
Reviews.Author: Ali Alaidarous
Reviews.Content: I received the camera and it was wonderful, all what I want to say is thank you for your offer.

Reviews.Title: Camera Good; Extras, Less So
Reviews.Author: craig bickle
Reviews.Content: The camera and lenses arrived fully functional; however, the USB card reader did not work and the camera bag was moldy.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 17 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Canon EOS Rebel T5i 18.0 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 3-inch Touchscreen and Full HD Movie Mode (Body) - Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Zoom Lens - Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens - Telephoto & Wide Angle Lens Set - 3 pc Filter Kit: UV/ Polarizing filter/Fluorescent correction & Case
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional LP-E8 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack - Well Protective SLR Camera Gadget Bag w/Pockets & Strap
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Focus DVD Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - Focus Digital Grey Card Set for color correction - Focus 5pc Dlx Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI cable for HDTV connection - BONUS!! Free 25 Quality Prints
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i 18.0 MP CMOS Digital Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Zoom Lens + EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens + Telephoto & Wide Angle Lenses + 12pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
